word: There are diligent students of the Word of prophecy in all parts of the world, who are obtaining light and still greater light from searching the Scriptures. This is true of all nations, of all tribes, and all people. These will come from the grossest error, and will take the place of those who have had opportunities and privileges and have not prized them. . . . We are now making our choice, and we shall soon discern between him that serveth God and him that serveth Him not. . . .
